title: Kristin Has An Uncomfortable Question To Ask Moe
description:
Yesterday, Bert told us about a picture he accidentally posted of his fiancée. In the pictured there was something exposed that he wasn't aware of until listeners told him.
When he told us this story, there was something that Moe said that confused Kristin. So today, she's seeking an explanation from him.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
